DECLARE @g geometry;

SET @g = geometry::STGeomFromText(@wkt, 4326);

SELECT @g.STIsValid() AS valid_geom;    -- results: valid_geom = 1

SELECT @g.STIsSimple() AS simple_geom;  -- results: simple_geom = 0
